sentences.sContent: We really don't want to be the overlords of the Palestinian population.
sentences.sCn: 我们真的不想当巴勒斯坦人的主子。

synos.tran: 霸王；大君主；最高统治者；封建领主

remMethod.val: over(超过) + lord(领主) → 领主上面的领主 → 最高领主

trans.tranCn: 霸王；大君主；最高统治者；封建领主
trans.tranOther: someone with great power over a large number of people, especially in the past
